MANIFEST_DESCRIPTION.message: Petit outil pratique conçu pour améliorer votre expérience SCP
MANIFEST_DESCRIPTION.description: Short description displayed on Chrome extensions page

AUTHOR_PAGE.description: Label that gets added to wikidot user info dialog

OPTIONS_TITLE.description: Title of the options page (label of tab in Chrome)

OPTIONS_WIKI_SETTINGS_HEADER.description: Sub-header for the list of on-wiki features

OPTIONS_USE_LINKIFIER.message: Convertir le texte simple en lien vers la page concernée :
OPTIONS_USE_LINKIFIER.description: Description for the checkbox deciding whether or not plain text will be converted into links (linkified)

OPTIONS_LINKIFIER_STRICT_TEMPLATE.description: Description for more strict linkifier option (in dropdown)

OPTIONS_LINKIFIER_LAX_TEMPLATE.description: Description for less strict linkifier option (in dropdown)

OPTIONS_LINKIFIER_SMART_TEMPLATE.message: Strict sur le Wiki, souple sur les forums
OPTIONS_LINKIFIER_SMART_TEMPLATE.description: Description for smart linkifier option (in dropdown)

OPTIONS_AUTHOR_PAGE.message: Ajouter le lien de la page d'auteur aux informations de l'utilisateur
OPTIONS_AUTHOR_PAGE.description: Description for the checkbox deciding whether or not add link to SCP author(member) page to user info dialog

OPTIONS_ARTICLE_NAME_IN_TITLE.message: Ajouter le nom de l'article tel qu'affiché sur la liste principale au titre
OPTIONS_ARTICLE_NAME_IN_TITLE.description: Description for the checkbox deciding whether or not add SCP name from the main list to the title (when reading an article)

OPTIONS_FORUM_PAGES_HISTORY.message: Ajouter les pages du forum à l'historique du navigateur
OPTIONS_FORUM_PAGES_HISTORY.description: Description for the checkbox deciding whether or not add forum thread pages to browser history

OPTIONS_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_HEADER.description: Label for a list of features used both on wiki and other websites

OPTIONS_TOOLTIP_NAMES.message: Rajouter des infobulles aux liens des SCP
OPTIONS_TOOLTIP_NAMES.description: Description for the checkbox deciding whether or not a tooltip with an article name should be shown when user is hovering mouse over a link to SCP

OPTIONS_FOOTER_LICENSE.message: Le code source et toutes les ressources de cette extension sont sous
OPTIONS_FOOTER_LICENSE.description: First part of the first line of the footer on options page

OPTIONS_FOOTER_LICENSE_NAME.description: Name of the license. Probably shouldn't be translated at all, except, maybe, word license. Full line in english: 'Source code and all resources of this extension are distributed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 license

OPTIONS_FOOTER_ATTRIBUTION1.message: Les idées d'objets SCP, la Fondation SCP, son logo, sa phrase "Sécuriser. Confiner. Protéger" ont été créées par
OPTIONS_FOOTER_ATTRIBUTION1.description: First part of the second line of the footer

OPTIONS_FOOTER_ATTRIBUTION2.description: Second part of the second line of the footer

OPTIONS_FOOTER_ATTRIBUTION3.message: et sont toutes soumises à la même licence.
OPTIONS_FOOTER_ATTRIBUTION3.description: Third and last part of the second line of the footer. Full line in english: 'Idea of SCP objects, SCP Foundation, SCP Foundation logo, "Secure. Contain. Protect" motto were created by SCP creative community and are available under the same license.'

OPTIONS_EASTER_EGG.message: Technicien junior F███████: "Hé mec, t'es sûr que tu veux pas juste [DONNEES SUPPRIMEES] ce truc ?"
OPTIONS_EASTER_EGG.description: A little easter egg on the options page :P

OPTIONS_SAVING_ERROR.description:
Text of error that is show if options can't be saved. Ignore $ERROR$. 
 is a new string. Don't translate placeholders

TRANSLATION_CREDIT.message: La traduction en français de cette extension a été effectuée par la $TRANSLATORS$.
TRANSLATION_CREDIT.description: Last line of the options page crediting you for the translation =)

TRANSLATORS.description: List of translators' nicknames divided by commas
